import "./css/register.css"; import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const Email_Regex = /^((([a-z]|\d|[!#\$%&'\*\+\-\/=\?\^_`{\|}~]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])+(\.([a-z]|\d|[!#\$%&'\*\+\-\/=\?\^_`{\|}~]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])+)*)|((\x22)((((\x20|\x09)*(\x0d\x0a))?(\x20|\x09)+)?(([\x01-\x08\x0b\x0c\x0e-\x1f\x7f]|\x21|[\x23-\x5b]|[\x5d-\x7e]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(\\([\x01-\x09\x0b\x0c\x0d-\x7f]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF]))))*(((\x20|\x09)*(\x0d\x0a))?(\x20|\x09)+)?(\x22)))@((([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])*([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])))\.)+(([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])*([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])))$/i; const PWD_Regex = /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{8,}$/; const Register = () => { const [details, setDetails] = useState({ email: "", firstName: "", middleName: "", lastName: "", gender : "", phoneNo: "", password: "", password1: "" }) const [validation,setValidation] = useState(false) // const [genderDetails,setenderDetails] = useState({ // gender : "" // }) const inputChange = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) console.log(event.target.name) const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value setDetails((prevalue) => { console.log(prevalue) console.log({...prevalue,[name] : value}) return { ...prevalue,[name] : value } }) } useEffect(() => { const email_validation = Email_Regex.test(details.email) setValidation(email_validation) },[details.email]) const submitData = (event) => { event.preventDefault() } return ( <>
Male         Female         Others        
  I accept the terms and conditions
) } export default Register;
